wizard.title: [CS] Family Shield Configuration
wizard.subtitle: [CS] Deploy your comprehensive family protection system in 2 strategic steps

welcome.title: [CS] Welcome to Strategic Family Protection
welcome.subtitle: [CS] Deploy military-grade security for your family's future
welcome.description: [CS] Configure your Family Shield to protect what matters most. This deployment takes less than 3 minutes and provides lifetime security for your loved ones.

benefits.automation: [CS] Automated emergency response and family notifications

protection.title: [CS] Primary Protection Objectives
protection.subtitle: [CS] Define your core family protection requirements
protection.description: [CS] Select your primary protection focus to customize your Family Shield configuration:

comprehensive.title: [CS] Comprehensive Legacy Protection
comprehensive.description: [CS] Complete family security including wills, emergency protocols, and digital asset management

emergency.title: [CS] Emergency Response Protocol
emergency.description: [CS] Focus on dead man's switch and emergency family notification systems
emergency.features: [CS] Dead Man's Switch,Auto Notifications,Emergency Contacts,Crisis Management

legal.title: [CS] Legal Document Management
legal.description: [CS] Comprehensive will generation and legal document security

family.title: [CS] Family Coordination Hub
family.description: [CS] Secure platform for family collaboration and information sharing

deployment.title: [CS] Deployment Configuration
deployment.subtitle: [CS] Configure your operational parameters
deployment.description: [CS] Fine-tune your Family Shield for optimal performance:

jurisdiction.label: [CS] Legal Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: [CS] Primary legal framework for document generation

maximum.title: [CS] Maximum Security
maximum.description: [CS] Highest security level with real-time threat analysis

notifications.label: [CS] Notification Protocol
notifications.description: [CS] Configure how your family receives critical updates

completion.title: [CS] Family Shield Deployed Successfully
completion.subtitle: [CS] Your comprehensive protection system is now active
completion.description: [CS] Your Family Shield has been configured and deployed. All systems are operational and monitoring your family's security.

nextSteps.title: [CS] Strategic Next Steps
nextSteps.steps: [CS] Review your personalized family protection dashboard,Configure emergency contacts and family network,Generate your first legally compliant will,Set up automated backup and monitoring systems

completion.assurance: [CS] Your family's future is now secured with military-grade protection protocols.

validation.selectOption: [CS] Please select at least one option
